sentence: I know Mike Gibbons will join me in demanding that Fauci is immediately fired and removed from office.” Oz’s ad, meanwhile, finds him saying, “The big government medical establishment came after me because I dared to challenge Fauci on COVID.” It's past time Fauci faces the fact that he got COVID wrong.
author: Alex Henderson
title: Republicans once praised Anthony Fauci for saving lives -- and now he’s the boogieman of MAGA attack ads

sentence: Sen. Rand Paul, R-Ky., a vocal critic of Fauci, recently released an ad endorsing Ohio GOP Senate candidate Mike Gibbons in a video noting his support for firing the nation's top expert on infectious disease.
author: Theodore Bunker
title: GOP Campaign Ads Vilify Fauci: 'Freedom Over Flip-Flops'

sentence: “I know Mike Gibbons will join me in demanding that Fauci is immediately fired and removed from office.” In enlisting Paul to pad his anti-vaccine mandate credentials, Gibbons chose a top Fauci nemesis to make his point.
title: Fauci might as well be running for office

sentence: “I know Mike Gibbons will join me in demanding that Fauci is immediately fired and removed from office.” Georgia GOP Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene and others have been pushing for Fauci to be fired for months.
author: Chris Cillizza
title: 2021: The year scientists became a political football
